author: Erich Schwartzel
title: How to Ask Someone Out Online: Tips From the Writers of ‘The Big Sick’
text:
Emily V. Gordon and Kumail Nanjiani are the Oscar-nominated screenwriters behind “The Big Sick.” They’re also married to one another.
“The Big Sick” dramatizes several weeks early in their relationship, after Ms. Gordon fell ill and was placed in a medically induced coma. It doesn’t sound like the stuff of comedy, but “The Big Sick” has earned raves for its ability to wring humor from Ms. Gordon’s condition and Mr. Nanjiani’s predicament: How to impress your girlfriend’s parents while she’s lying in a coma next to you. 
...
